Pre-Game Insights: India needs to win the 4th T20I to stay in the series
Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill are expected to open for India
Sanju Samson may replace Ishan Kishan as the wicket-keeper
Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, and Kuldeep Yadav are likely to be in the playing 11
Umran Malik may replace Mukesh Kumar in the bowling lineup
